name: Ulmon
description: mobile apps for travel and navigation
overview:
Ulmon sells apps for smart phones and tablets which solve the problem of limited network availability of travelers. The apps deliver interactive maps and travel content, which is relevant to the traveller on-location; and which is available off-line, any time.

Ulmon owns their own map rendering technology, called “Ulmon Vector Maps”.

City Maps 2Go is a Top10/Top20 best selling app in the App Store worldwide. The City Guides 2Go series (e.g. Paris 2Go, New York 2Go) are the best selling travel guides in the App Store.
